content.detailedDescription: First sighting craft appeared out of nowhere with short contrail red from sunset, after 1 min vanished.3 min later in same location craft reappeared this time craft was visible and glowing bright red grew in shape to a point traveled a short distance/se the as before it vanished.No trace. i was sitting in my car waiting for a friend who was shopping at walley world/walmart.
content.summary: There were around five to six high altitude military craft flying north with short contrails,this craft appeared out of the blue with an orange /red contrail then it suddenly disappeard.About 3 mins later in same location/nw craft reappeard as before but

content.detailedDescription: I heard the booming sounds of fireworks so i went outside to see them. they were too low/far away, so i just looked up in the sky to see the stars. at first i thought that the bright red/orange flashing ligts was a wayward firework, but there was no smoke and it moved like a plane at first. as it moved in my direction, it got real slow, but had no sound so i ruled out that it was a helicopter. my cat followed me outside so i picked him up to look at it. then i thought it might be a blimp but there was no mass. it was shaped like a "top" and the center rotated around. then suddenly it darted off to the east and vanished. i saw the stars behind it and there was no imprint or smoke after it disappeared. it was just gone! i waited for it to come back, but it didn't. after that my cat acted freaked out with big eyes and started running around like it was trying to hide! i was very happy to have finally seen that (although i probably have seen them before and not ackowledged it). i'm glad to know others saw it too, even though it seems that the other versions were 1 or more separate orbs, so maybe when i saw it they had all collected together. it was fun to watch. i'm looking forward the next show again! please come back!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 21-31-13 went outside 9:10pm looked up saw red/orange flashing ufo

content.detailedDescription: Saturday morning pulled in to parking area at geis property part of the grand river public hunting area and got ready for early morning bow hunting. started walking north along woodline to back of the property. crossed thru a small wooded area that splits the fields into sections and walked trail for about a minute when i looked forward and noticed a light above trees just completing a turn towards me. ok whats this, plane no, helicopter no. no sound during approach in my direction .It looked round until it got closer then i could see it was shaped like an elongated egg a very big egg. this craft was at my 11 o,clock position and approx. 100ft long and 40 to 50ft wide with no sound at all and being only over the tree tops it was very close to me.The light this thing was giving off looked like a new led billboard, white with the brightness turned down i could also see the surface was like the surface of an egg. i know the egg thing again but the surface looked rough like a poor paint job. no runs but not smooth at all. at first look it looked lit from the inside but after focusing in on the edges there was a clear to yellowish plasma surrounding it approx 2ft thick. i had time to check this thing out it"s speed was only 10 to 15 mph. smooth around front,side bottom and rear. no windows, doors,seams,landing gear nothing.So i watched it head south staying low until out of sight. amazing. no cell phone or camera and by myself dumb i know. just glad it didn"t stop. 5:15am
content.summary: Object turned from east to south at 500 yds 25 to 30 ft off tree tops headed to my location witnessed  overhead flyby at close range no sound headed south along grand river until out off sight..

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
Hello and ty for responding.
marco island, fl
march 29, 2013 - good friday
marco island, fl
march 29, 2013 - good friday
11:00 - 11:30 to past midnight
south end of island

while standing on the balcony looking out toward the hi-rise buildings & sky as i have done for 15 plus years in fl, i noticed a distinct difference with reference to one of the red lights on the aerial hi-rises.... one seemed to be moving. from my location i can see one dozen red safety lights/aerials on the hi-rise roofs. initially the red light i saw moving was thought to be a helicopter or deducted it was some sort of distant aircraft. i continued watching as it traveled ever so slowly from the southwest to the southeast, realizing the moving red light i was watching was not a plane or helicopter, i became interested. the red light lingered behind one of the buildings for several minutes and then continued on a straight path over the gulf for about four-five blocks proceeding southeast. as i continued to watch, the red light descended ever so fast (into the gulf ?) and it was gone! i immediatley went upstairs to a neighor - my late night walking partner. i explained what i saw. she got her husband's binocluars, and again, the same redlight, or a different one came back. again coming from the west traveling to the east - and again it quickly descended. if it was the same one what incredible speed to have returned.  5-10 minutes passed - i thought it was over, but yet another sighting, and closer this time. through binoculars, bright white lights could be seen around /on the side of the object visible. i felt over-whelmed, amazed, my feelings re ufos validated, breath-taking.  
i needed an answer. i was touched.
 
contacted both fire / police departments.  i was informed there was a call for a boat in distress - red flare, authorities found no boat in distress. evidentally someone saw that red light either ascending or descending thinking it a distress signal. that was no distress signal.
content.summary: Red light moving sw to se. descent and then back again sw to se

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling nw on coliseum blvd at 8pm on 12/24/13 in fort wayne in. i looked out my passenger side window and saw two orange round lights just above the city lights. the one on the left was slightly higher from my perspective than the one on the right. they were both the same size. my immediate impression was that it was an airplane and it was tilted in a turn to its left. (all i saw were the orange lights and i could not understand what an airplane would be doing so close to the ground and in that particular location)  as i continued to look over at it for the next few seconds i noticed it was not actually making a turn. it seemed to be just floating forward. as i was watching it, the light on the left swung in an upward arc about 80 degrees and stopped in a position directly above the other orb. it stopped in that position and both orbs continued to slowly float in my direction. the distances between the two orbs did not seem to change as the one positioned itself above the other. from the time the left orb started to arc upwards until it was directly above the other orb was about 3-4 seconds. my best guess at the distance between them at this point would be between 75 and 150 feet. i can be rather dense at times but i realized that this was quite odd, and since i was in indiana for the holidays visiting family i had kept my camera with me at all times. by then i could sort of judge the speed, and realized i would have time to pull off at the next opportunity and film this thing. it took me perhaps 15-30 seconds to pull into the next parking lot, get my camera out of the case, find the stupid button in the dark, and start filming. i did not look at them during this time. by then it was nearly above me and just to the south east. i filmed both orbs for just over 1 minute as they floated along. i zoomed in and out several times to get some perspective on them. as you can see on the film they were perfectly round and pulsed like they were made of fire. what you cannot see in the film, but which i can see when i play it on my camera is in the last few seconds of the film the building i am next to comes into few and you can get a great idea of the speed they are traveling. in the film it looks like they both just blink out, but in reality they disappear one at a time as they pass over the building and out of sight. i then jump back in the truck to zoom around to the other side of the building and continue filming. this took about 15 ��� 20 seconds. when i got to where i should have seen them they were not there. the sky seemed to be clear at that point and i thought i could faintly see an orange glow far out into the sky. (i could see a multitude of stars also) this is my story. at times i think perhaps someone had launched some sort of x-mas eve light tradition thing, but i will let you look at it and you can tell me. my regret is that you cannot see the rooftop of the building come into view, as the objects pass over it. i could see it coming and purposely positioned the camera so the rooftop would be in view as long as possible. it is very easy to see on my camera. i still have the picture card with the original film. i can send my film with skydrive if necc. when filming i used the following: 
cannon powershot xs 150 is 
12x optical zoom
14.1 megapixels
content.summary: Two orange pulsating, floating orbs. 1 minute of film.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking with my aunt when i first noticed a misterious lightball in the sky, i was looking at the stars when i noticed something different. i thought it was a cell phone tower but then i realized it didn't had a base so it definitely was an ufo. it was an orange glowing ball in the sky. more than scared i'd say i feel surprised and curious about the event. it last only 15 minutes, then it fade out.
content.summary: Orange fireball in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Just after dark on january third i happened to look out my living room window and see what i initially thought was a plane on fire. i said to my wife "what the heck is that".   i have a big panoramic view from our house from denver skyline area to near colorado springs and mountains to the west.  very clear skies.  i went outside to look and saw an orange object headed towards me my wife stayed inside.  appeared fairly low like you might see a light airplane fly.  seemed to have a radiating glowing appearance that i originally mistook for flames.  as it came closer i began to realize it was unlike anything i had ever seen.  it did not appear to have lights per say but rather the entire object gave off light and seemed to have bars of light radiate out sort of like a cartoonish star. my wife described them as bright but they were actually dull orange.  the radiatiing light is what gives the appearance of being bright but it was not bright. it is hard to describe.  it was sort of like seeing an oncoming light in fog where it radiates out in the water vapor.   it appeared roughly round.  no details visible but in recollection it at times looked sort of like a clear jelly fish with orange features.  what i mean by that is that i do remember being able to see features in a way.  not like a window or a plane like feature but rather uneven features within the light.  again hard to describe.  the object appeared to be going about the speed of a jet airplane.  it traveled from the mountains to the west passing over my house in a minute or less.  i ran out the east side of the house and it continued over the horizon.  totally silent.  my heart was racing it was an exciting experience.  i went back in the house and declared "that was a ufo"  we sat there talking about it and collecting ourselves etcetera.  about ten minutes went by and we saw another one again through the window.  this time we both raced outside.  the one turned out to be two.  fairly far apart traveling in parallel formation again coming from due west headed east.  i grabbed my phone and took a picture.  hard to do because it was dark and not much time.  again these two objects went directly over head.  looked exactly like the first.  i can say with absolute certainty that these were not known aircraft.  the most striking and odd features where the appearance and the complete silence.  these went directly over head and continued on at fairly low altitude and it was absolutely silent.  again our view offers a big sky line and soon after this event it seemed that there were planes everywhere.  some coming from denver area some from colorado springs.  some headed in roughly same direction as objects some did not.  after this we wanted to see more and i had the sense that we would but we did not.  i looked up the local news expecting it to be a big story as it was that blatant and clear but saw nothing on the news.  the only things i could find was by typing in ufo news and there were similiar sightings in california a couple days before.  i wasn't going to post anything but the complete lack of reports is disturbing  so here it is.  enclosed is a photo i took with my note phone.  i took the photo on zoom and then zoomed in some more post photo to make more clear.  im sure my hand was moving but thats what i have.  i would have to say it is the most amazing thing i have seen.  so far the few people i have shared it with have been insultingly dismissive about it.   it is interesting to be on the other side and see how people react.  one final opinion of mine.  it seemed given the altitude, time of day,  size, and emitted light that what ever else is the case, they wanted to be seen.  that is why i am submitting this.
content.summary: Three glowing orange objects flew over my house heading east one first two more ten minutes later

content.detailedDescription:
We were returning home to williamstown by car late one night from adelaide cit,y past gawler town, on a country road that we knew very well by sight when my mother and i both noticed a stationary blob of bright shining coloured lights/large object about the size of a combine harvester in a wheatfield in a slight depression. we know that field very well as we pass it four times a week or so.
it was very unusual for any human activity to be occuring in that field at night. we assumed it could have been a farmer with his harvest machinery and their lights on. we arrived home a lot later than we anticipated and were a little confused with the time. i was six years old and not prone to seeing hallucinations.

only in 2009 when i read a small publication from the gawler library about the multiple gawler ufo sightings did i consider that what we witnessed/saw could have been what was witnessed by many others over the years from 1950's to present day with a particular 'flap' in late 1969. what was described in the local newspaper matched what we saw very convincingly and the location was consistent with other aerial sightings earlier that same evening within five miles radius of gawler town hall. i have never told anyone this story since that evening except since the 2009 publication.
the ufo phenomenon has been seen hovering over the town hall and local farmland over many decades. i think that em static ball energy from a local geological faultline may be an explanation, as many sightings have so often been.

the edinbugh raaf base is nearby and they have a radar facility that existed in 1969. they will have reports dating back to that decade/time.

the object was in a place where no objects should have been at that time of night and it was generating enough warm-coloured lights to light up a football field. it was not a ball, but more of a multi-facetted shape. there must have been over six lights illuminating the field. we did not see the actual object obscured by its light display as we drove past at about 40miles per hour on a remote quiet country road devoid of many big trees just at that point somewhere near sandy creek backroad, not the main road.
content.summary: Multi-coloured bright object sighted close to gorund or on ground in a field at night and witnessed by several other witnesses over long period of time in the vicinity confirmed by local newspaper article.

content.detailedDescription: On 4 jan 14 around 6:50-7pm, i  was on my back porch smoking. for some reasoning i looked at the sky and saw what i thought was a bright star. the "star" was bright but had an orange tint to it. it started moving a little and i was thinking either i'm seeing stuff or it's moving. sure enough it was moving and i ran into my apartment and grabbed my roommate who saw it with me.  it moved right then stopped moved up and left at the same time like a half circle going counterclockwise then descended and disappeared because the trees blocked my view. this all happened in about 54 seconds. it was at least the altitude of an airplane but it was far enough to disappear behind 50-60ft trees that are 150yds from my backdoor. i've seen a lot of aircraft and i've never seen anything that maneuvered like what i saw or was as bright as what i saw. when it descended it did so in a straight line and you could tell it was at a steady speed. now i know how people feel when they see something like this and nobody believes them because i used to be one of those type of people. wow!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Appeared to be a star until it moved! right then left then hovered and descended with various speed.

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of january 4th, 2013, at approximately 10:50pm, i was brushing my teeth upstairs before going to bed and i walked into my son���s room (he was at his mother���s) to close his curtains. i looked out over our backyard and saw nothing at all. 

i then walked over to our spare bedroom, which is on the same side of the house and faces the same direction. when i went to close the blinds, i observed 6 large, bright red-orange lights hovering and circling around each other about 45 degrees above the horizon. when viewed in the sky, the objects were much bigger and brighter than stars but perhaps not as big as an aspirin tablet. 

i quickly called my wife to come over and we watched the objects circle each other in a large, vertical looping pattern for approximately three or four minutes. they then started to move off one-by-one in a north easterly direction. it took only seconds for each large, bright object to fade away and disappear in the sky.

i opened the window so that we could see and hear better, and while there was some noise from our neighbour���s house (the kind of humming a furnace makes) the objects themselves did not make any noise; there was no sound of engines or mechanics or anything else whatsoever. 

before they were gone, two more lights rose up (one by one) from behind the houses and trees along the sightline of the horizon. they again slowly circled each other in the same vertical looping pattern before flying off, this time one to the northeast like the others and the other towards the northwest. again, the large objects rapidly faded away and disappeared from sight.

i looked at the clock in my son���s bedroom and noted that it said 11:01pm. my wife and i talked about things for a few minutes, neither of us doubting what we had seen. i went downstairs to call my son and tell him, and when i did i noted that the time on the kitchen clock was 10:55. i realized that the clock in my son���s room was wrong (which my wife later verified). 

i timed the walk from window to window at approximately 10-12 seconds, so the crafts rose into the air in that time and were visible for approximately 3-4 minutes (we estimate). we also estimate that the objects were about three kilometers away, perhaps over the ottawa river. 

while i have read a great deal about ufos and such, i have never seen one before (that i know of) and am not given to histrionics. indeed, i am a long time employee of the federal government and have not one but two master���s degrees. not that that necessarily matters, but i like to think it adds some credibility to my account. i have never seen nor reported anything like this before but would have no difficulty talking about it to authorities or investigators.
content.summary: We observed 6 (and later 8) large, bright red-orange lights hovering and circling around each other before they rapidly moved off in a ne direction.

content.detailedDescription: Last night, jan 4, 2014, just as i fell asleep, my wife said look at these lights. what color do fire flies emit? i said yellow. these are apple red. at arms length, the 3 objects appeared to be about 1 3/8 inches in diameter. they were roundish but not perfectly round. they were the color of an apple. originally they were close to each other, and high in the sky. this was about 9:00pm.  then two of them went up and then to the right.  the other one went to the left rapidly, then just disappeared. originally they were about 45��� above the horizon, byt later ascended to about 60���.  i rule out balloons because they would have gone in the same direction, not opposite directions. i have been a ufo investigator since 1960.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 red, round objects. 2 of them ascended to moved to the right. the other one shot the left and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
While driving south on the yokosuka-yokohama toll road between the #6 zushi exit and the #7 yokosuka exit, i noted an unusual alternating red and white side by side light pattern in the distance.  this lights were within the approach pattern lane for airplanes heading for the haneda airport and i noted other passenger airliners within the airspace around the lights in question.  what struck me as unusual was that these lights were brighter and appeared either slightly larger or closer than the other aircraft in the area.  they did not display characteristics that i  normally noted with planes in an approach pattern.  they were level, side by side, alternating red then white vice flashing, i noted no flashing strobe lights, no running lights, no internal cabin lighting.  additionally, the white light was a brilliant white and lacked the yellowish tinge common to airliner landing lights or cabin lights.They appeared to be lower than the other aircraft in the pattern, however i was not able to tell due to darkness.  i observed them at a distance of what i speculate to be 10 to 16 miles away, based upon the location of the haneda flight pattern from my position on the toll road.  i briefly lost sight of it as i exited onto the #7 yokosuka exit and entered the honcho yamanaka toll road.  i sighted it again upon exiting the a tunnel on the toll road.  it was now generally west of my location and appeared to positioned beyond  the yokosuka naval base.  i estimate it was over tokyo bay, close to the chiba peninsula.  upon first sight, the lights were moving to the left in a se to n direction.  upon last sight they appeared stationary or were possibly  moving away from me in a westerly direction, thus giving the illusion of being stationary.   i am a 22 year navy veteran on active duty and have observed all manner of civilian and military aircraft  during both day and night to include night time carrier approach.  i am very familiar with both military and civilian aircraft patterns in the area and their general lighting configurations.  these lights looked almost like building aircraft warning lights, but they were at a much higher altitude, were brighter, and were moving.

additional info:

not likely to be a helicopter since i noted no running lights or strobing lights.  additionally it did not look like any military or civilian helicopters that i have observed at night in the past.

temp: 9 degrees c.  (noted by digital temp sign next to entrance of the honcho yamanaka toll road)

angle of approx 36 degees determined by ipod clinometer application.

haneda flight pattern location and determined by ipod flight radar application.

distance from first sighting location to general area of haneda approach pattern measured by google earth.

weather: slight overcast obscuring moon in the east.  no reflection from ground lighting noted, visibility  at sea level approx 28 miles.  based upon tokyo landmarks being clearly visible from the north end of the yokosuka naval base.
content.summary: Alternating red and white light (possible airplane?)

content.detailedDescription: Please see pictures attached
content.summary: Accidently captured alien presense in 2 of our bedroom windows

content.detailedDescription: i herd a sound and right now there is a saucer metal and slight glow with dancing lights outside my window. i can see some figures shooting a laser of something around. they are killing my cattle. if anyone is around inyo right now..There is a freaking landed ufo. omg they see me,.  oh here we go..
content.summary: There is a saucer outside my window right now!

content.detailedDescription: I was driving n on 101 in petaluma  and saw 5 bright orange lights in the sky in the shape of the big dipper. eventually, i realized it wasn't the big dipper. the orange lights were in perfect formation for a few minutes and then the 2 bottom lights came toward each other and i thought they would merge.  it was a little tough to track b/c i was driving on the freeway. everyone in front of me put on their breaks and slowed down to about 40 mph, to look at the lights. some people were pointing and others were turning their heads to see. i looked at other cars as i pulled off, because i wanted to see if others noticed it and they did. i pulled off  the freeway to park and get better view. the lights then moved into a diamond formation.  as i watched, the two lights at the top began to flicker sort of in and out of view. one by one...They began to just fade out and disappear.  they were relatively close to the ground and really amazing to see. i'm wondering if anyone else reported seeing them. it was about 9:30 - 10:00pm on saturday night, 1/4/14.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 5 bright orange lights forming the big dipper then changed form to diamond shape.

content.detailedDescription:
i was in my backyard barbequeing some chicken. the time was about 6:55 pm. i know this as i always check time so as to turn the meat every 5 to 10 minutes. 
 one of my favorite things to do is star gaze, so my backyard was unlit to enhance the clearsky viewing opportunity of this night. the moon is currently a waxing crescent size and shape so little light was coming from it.
 i was sitting in a chair looking at the sky when 3 objects came into view heading east. they were moving at the same speed and glowed a dim red-orange color.  they were in a triangle with a single light in front and the other 2 in the rear, spaced equally apart and in an unwavering formation as if they were part of a single object.
 at first i thought they were ducks or geese which do fly at night sometimes. but i quickly noticed a lack of wings flapping and the objects moved in a straight line whereas birds moving quickly tend to move in erratic formations.
 i was a bit flabbergasted and awestruck at what i had just witnessed. i went into my house to tell my wife. she almost immediately pulled up a story of sightings on new years  of this year in sacramento. as the lights came into view i was absolutely locked in to them.
 i lost sight of the lights as my view was blocked by a building that abuts my backyard.
 the time elapsed was about 20 seconds
content.summary: I looked up from my unlit backyard and saw 3 low-lit lights moving at a good clip. i did not hear any engine noise at all.

content.detailedDescription: I went out for a smoke around 6 pm on 1/4/14 and walked down the sidewalk to observe the south west direction. since i had my sighting on 12/23/13 i watch the sky in this direction like a hawk when i am outside. it was just starting to turn dusk and the western sky was orange from the setting sun with a few clouds. i then looked further to the south and seen a unusual object in the sky heading in my direction. i did not have my camera with me so i made a dash into the apartment for it. once i got back i started filming what looked like a cigar shaped craft with the front facing down towards the ground. it was a dark grey in color and no lights or noise was observed. i watched and filmed the object until it headed into the clouds and was gone. i later reviewed the recording and the quality of this video is horrible. at about 15 seconds right under the highest cloud seen you will see a blurry gray object move from left to right slowly.
content.summary: Cigar shaped ufo with a tilt

content.detailedDescription: On new year's eve, my cousins and i witness a red fireball streak above the roof tops off the canals of royal palm beach as we were in a enclosed deck. the fireball came from the east, then turned north and stopped. it began to change shape from a ball to a triangle shape, but my cousin thought it was more rectangle shape. it started to pulse, white, red, then a orange color. the lights began to change position on the object. as i was videotaping the object, and the pulsating lights, it went straight up in an accelerated rate. it was like a blink and it was gone. i got 14 seconds of it on video after it changed from a fireball to a triangle shape. it was totally silent. no helicopter sound, no plane sound and no fire work sound. if this was a fire work, it must have been the most expensive one i've ever seen, especially when it changed shape/morphed.
content.summary: Small fire ball that streak across, then hovered, started to blink lights, then went straight up at fast rate.

content.detailedDescription: I went out onto back porch to have a smoke, and i saw a very bright light through the trees. i was sure it was not the moon, so i moved around a bit to get a better view. it was definitely moving, and the lights were white with an orange tint to them at times. as the light got brighter, i could see that the object was enormous and triangular in shape. the lights faded out within a minute or so, maybe one at a time. it appeared to be hovering over the vicinity of the olympia airport, and it was moving in a westwardly direction. the skin had a orangeish rust color from what i could tell in the glow of its lights.
content.summary: Saw huge lighted craft hovering then move off to west

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting on my back porch, i noticed what looked like an orange ball of fire moving east to west.  i initially thought this was just a plane or helicopter as i usually see, as i live in the flight path of the scottsdale airport.  as it got closer, the object appeared to be a flaming chevron or bow shape that was glowing and smoldering like a fire.  the object appeared to completely stop when it was directly south of my backyard, then change direction, moving north toward my home, then stopped again, turning 180 degrees in a half circle motion back to the southern horizon until my view was obstructed by a home.
  
the object did not make any engine or propeller noise while i observed it and also seemed to change direction in a controlled and deliberate manner.  visibility was clear and moon, stars and constellations could be clearly seen.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing orange light hovers and changes direction in scottsdale, az

content.detailedDescription:
We live in the northeast part of dayton, oh.  i���m a retired air force officer and currently working as a defense contractor; i have several technical degrees to include a bachelors in aerospace engineering.  i was an air force pilot and worked for several years at headquarters air force space command.

on dec 31, 2013 at 10:00pm, i went to take the trash out.  as soon as i went outside, i noticed a formation of red-orange lights moving slowly through the sky.  we had a broken cloud deck from 1000'-1500', with some light from the city being reflected from the underside of the clouds, and these objects were clearly visible underneath the cloud deck.  there were about 12-15 objects, from the s-sw to n-nw, moving over our house - completely silent, so i knew they weren't airplanes or helicopters.  they were in a ragged line formation, all moving at the same speed, and the objects at the head of the line were grouped in a square formation and weren't moving - almost as if they were waiting for the others to catch up.  the head of the formation began to get dimmer, as did the others behind them and that's when i noticed that the objects right over our house were climbing into the cloud deck.  they all faded from view.

when i first saw them, i knew that they weren't the typical aircraft that we see in our area, being in the traffic pattern of wright-patterson afb.  i called for my wife to come out and take a look, and when she came out and saw what was happening, she went back in to get her camera.  however, her camera was a point and shoot and didn't get a good focus on the lights, i guess they were just points of light to the optics and she didn't get any photos.  given the visibility, brightness of the objects and proximity to the base, i would expect the air force tower controllers to have made visual contact with these objects.

entire encounter was about six minutes.

i know that these weren���t airplanes, helicopters, balloons or birds.  these were objects under some type of control and were able to maintain a disciplined spacing and formation.
content.summary: Red-orange light over flying dayton, oh on new year's eve

content.detailedDescription: My dad and i were picking my mom up from work. we were parked in the parking lot for 15-20 min. all of a sudden we see exactly 5 planes in the sky. we thought it was weird (we live in the country.) so we were looking in the sky, they all had very pronounced jet streams. then 2 of them stopped, the streams behind them disappeared, and they just hovered there. my dad and i were in shock. then the 3 other planes approached the other 2 hovering metallic objects,and then one of the hovering objects was absorbed by the other metallic object. and then there was just that one metallic hovering object that sat there for approximately 10 min. one plane then flew away and there were only 2 planes left.Then we lost track of all of them. it was really insane. it was a clear sky. i almost forgot, my dad and i saw the crazy stuff, but my mom saw the single hovering metallic object.
content.summary: A bunch of planes. then 2 stopped.

content.detailedDescription:
As i was bringing out the garbage on 1/1/2014 @ 11:55 pm i saw 3 unexplained red pulsating red light traveling over golden gate park/ ocean beach in san francisco...

(this video shows the last 2 red pulsating red lights as we were so drawn into the first one, we only caught 20 seconds of the first one, however i do have videos of the 1st pulsating red light as well if anyone is interested in seeing, i can certainly upload it as well.

the weird anomaly really shows in this video, please note that the first red pulsating light appear for about 1-2 mins, shortly after within 15-20 seconds the 2nd one appeared and moments later the 3rd red pulsating light appeared.

upon looking over the videos after the incident, to my surprise the video showed a yellowish glowing holographic moving orb at a very fast pace throughout the video. btw i should mention while filming the pulsating red lights the yellowish mirror like object was not visible to the naked eye but rather only appearing in video.

imo i got the impression that the glowing yellow orb was some sort of emp frequency which disturb the accuracy of the footage. again it's only my opinion, moments after the red lights disappear/ fainted a plane was spotted with the naked eyes traveling in the same direction as the red spheres, however the plane would not show up on the video nor did the red pulsating red lights after the glowing object got close to us @1:20-1:23 (in the footage) which again i must emphasize we did not see with our naked eyes and was only caught on footage upon examination. (its a shame we only had a iphone 5 video capabilities @ hand and did not have a high-end camcorder on hand)

shortly after the incident (prior to reviewing the footage) i proceeded to my roof top in search of the red lights directions and distance however it was no where to be seen. as for the plane (yes i can tell it was a plane as it blinked in normal formation white/red & green pattern like most planes) turned around and flew back in the same direction it came from, which i thought was odd since most plane i witness tends to fly in one direction vs making a u-turn and flying back to the same direction it came from.

none the less it was a very interesting night to end the first day of new year. i can't explain what the red pulsating lights were or where the last 2 pulsating red light came from, and i sure as heck cannot explained what the yellowish light was as it was not visible with the naked eyes. initially i thought it was a glare but was skeptical since some of the "still" footage continue to shows the yellowish, mirror/ shadow like moving orb flying around. for all i know i could be wrong and it could be very well just a glare or a holographic projection.

i'm not vouching what i saw nor am i dismissing it. i am simply sharing what i witnessed and experience, its up to you to take it for what its for. im just sharing my 2 cents on this fascinating weird anomaly....Whatever this was, it sure raised our eyebrows.

happy 2014 and feel free to enlighten me on your thoughts and opinions.
content.summary: 1/1/2014 ufo unexplained red pulsating light object over san francisco, california

content.detailedDescription: No personal witness.  game camera caught apparent anomaly early in morning.  other images around same time showed nothing like image captured.  may be camera malfunction.  just don't know how to explain this image.  very very remote location in trans-pecos region of southwest texas.  i would be happy to send digital photo.  unable to use your form to submit.
content.summary: Game camera caught object near deer feeder.  other photos taken same time span.

content.detailedDescription: On dec. 31, 2013; i had walked out of my apartment to go to work.  upon getting over to where my truck was parked, i noticed a large orange light to the east.  at first i thought it was a commercial jet on approach to seatac or a c-17 on approach to mcchord afb but then i noticed a severe lack of movement for it to be a jet.  after putting my lunch in my truck i just stood and watched the object move from the east to the west in a slow, lazy and jagged course.  i describe the course as "jagged" because it definitely was heading from east to west, but just like with flying an airplane, or driving a ship, there are always minute adjustments going on and i could actually see these little minute changes.  as i always do, i tried to disprove what i was seeing but for something to be moving that slow it would have to have been a helicopter . . . there was no sound.  i looked for the navigational lights, red for left or port side and green for right or starboard side, and there were no flashing white, red, or green lights.  i stood there mesmerized for a little bit and just saying to myself, "wow, i get to see another one!"  besides being a witness to the phoenix lights in 1997, there was another sighting i had down in phoenix that has made me never look at the night skies the same.  i am always looking into the skies at night and looking and searching . . . its almost an addiction if im out at night.  i decided my wife had to see the things i had talked about seeing down in phoenix and ran back to tell her.  before ducking under the carport roof i checked to make sure the object was there and it was.  i ran up the stairs to the second floor, unlocked the door, ran and unlocked the patio door (telling my wife the whole way what i wanted her to see), stepped outside and the object was gone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I witnessed an orange ball of light travel very slowly from east to west and then hover.

content.detailedDescription: It was a small dot in the sky just moving very slowly then so did the next one.
content.summary: It was a small dot in the sky just moving very slowly then so did the next one.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my room and at about 8pm i looked out my window and saw the lights. their was about 5-6. they're usually airplanes that fly around the same area but these lights were more stationary. about 5-6 of them all near the same area. after a couple of minutes most of them became invisible, not appearing to have traveled anywhere before they were gone. about 2 stayed a little longer than the rest but a minute after the others disappeared, they did as well. as if nothing was there to begin with. i didn't know what to think. my brain tried to rationalize, maybe it had been stars? but they shined brighter and more orange than the stars that were viewable at that time. it was exciting, but a little scary as well because i didn't know what the lights were.

 i heard about people seeing lights in california on new year's so when i first saw, that's what i thought, i think i may have seen the same thing. i seen something exactly the same january in 2009. i don't remember the exact date but the day they had the super bowl, so i can't forget that.
content.summary: I saw lights in the sky from my window

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
At the stroke of midnight on new year's eve 2013, my girlfriend and i were just watching the fireworks from our east-facing, 2nd story balcony overlooking downtown denver. this was the second display of fireworks in the same location that night. the first display took place at 9pm and we also watched those fireworks. 

however, shortly into the the grand finale during the midnight celebration, i noticed several (6 to 10) glowing orange orbs ascending into the sky due east. they seemed to be rising in sequence then slightly outstretched in a northern direction. although amateur fireworks were in the sky at the same time, these lights were distinctly rising and floating for several minutes. 

this was the third time we have witnessed the same ufo lights. 

1. the first episode was filed, reported and investigated by mufon and determined to be an official ufo sighting. that incident occurred on saturday, july 6, 2012 at 10:24 pm in the opposite sky (west) at the same location (visible from our west-facing balcony as well as the 5th story rooftop) and lasted several minutes with the exact same lights and phenomena. 

a friend in steamboat springs observed and witnessed the exact same lights in steamboat springs, colorado on the same night with her children present as well as one of their friends. she captured a photo (see attached). 

2. the  second episode was not filed or reported by was also witnessed by another neighbor off the the east balcony at 10:24 pm (same time as first episode) on february 24, 2013 (right after the oscar awards). 10 to 15 glowing, red-ornate orbs floated and hovered and ascended into the east sky near downtown denver. video footage captured. 

3. the third (and most recent) episode occurred at exactly 12:01 am january 1, 2014 in nearly the same exact location the the previous episode on february 24, 2013.  video footage captured. the only difference was that these lights were traveling in very slight north pattern vs the 2nd incident which were traveling in a south to sw direction.
content.summary: Witnessed glowing orbs in same location - third time

content.detailedDescription: At night i lesten to my police and aviation scanner. i have it locked into air traffice controll in kansas city. on the night of saterday dec 28 at around 9pm american flight 94 or 911 somithing like that called kansas city air traffic stating that there was a large bright light around 40 miles in front of him and requested if there was any air craft on there radar in the texas corridor. air traffic stated neg there was none. at that time the american flight requested to go from 12000 ft to 15000 ft then the american flight was told to go to a diffrent frec and all talk stopped on the scanner?. i new at that time that there was somithing not right and they changed to a new freq where no one could here them. on dec 29 at around the same time another american flight called kansas city and stated are you guys still seeing thoes lights in the arkansa corridor caus there back i have bright light out in front of me he requested to go from 9000 ft to 1200 ft after that all got quit there was no more traffic talk from him or kansas.   so all i can say is somithing is goning on over texas and arkansa at night with airtraffic. and there changing there freq real fast so you cant lesten in on any more talk. i got the felling that the second american flight on dec 29 new all about the lights that where seen on dec 28 caus the tone of his voice to air traffic controll was as if this is getting to be common??. i lesten to air traffic controll ever night and so fare there has not been any more chatter about lights .
content.summary: Large light

content.detailedDescription: On christmas night myself and six other family members were at my mothers house for christmas dinner. my brother was outside in the backyard talking to my sister on the phone around 7:30pm when he yelled through the screen door for us to come outside and look at this orange light in the sky. we all went outside and he pointed to the north and we saw an orange fireball type object slowly floating towards us in a southern direction. we watched it for about 5 minutes as it floated by. it had a flickering orange light all around it and it appeared to be around 1000-1,500 feet in altitude. as it went over our subdivision my mother took video of it and i took pictures of it with my iphone camera. my son took video of it with his gopro camera he just got for christmas. after it passed it started fading in and out in light intensity then just went dark. my mother said it appeared to her through the zoom on her camera to take a 90 degree turn to the right and just disappear. we have seen these type of orange lights before over the years but usually in south end of maricopa over the ak-chin indian reservation. about 3 minutes later we observed a second light north of our location but this one red and as it got closer it turned to orange. it was on the same path and altitude as the first one and it also went dark around the same location as the first one and disappeared. we also took video and pictures of that one as well. a few days later i used google earth to see the approximate flight path and location of these objects and it would have come from the direction of the phoenix airport 30 miles away and crossed directly over the air force space debris surveillance station that is a few miles outside our town on highway 347 that the air force just closed down a few months ago. you can see this site easily on google earth and it is in the gila river indian reservation.
content.summary: Orange/red glowing objects over maricopa az
